# Canopy

Social web platform.

![Demo](https://media.githubusercontent.com/media/canopy/canopy/main/demo.gif)

## Use

[Linux](https://github.com/canopy/canopy/releases/download/v0.0.1-alpha/gaea) |
Windows |
Mac

## Develop

    poetry install
    poetry run web serve canopy:app
    poetry run build_gaea
